comments.body: can you use fixtures here instead? (can be a followup)
Yeah, can do it as a followup.  Some of the machinery here is required for the `Base` class to work so will need to be changed across the board for all index tests inheriting from `Base`.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +15,19 @@    _holder = IntervalIndex

    def setup_method(self, method):
        self.index = IntervalIndex.from_arrays([0, 1], [1, 2])
        self.index_with_nan = IntervalIndex.from_tuples([(0, 1), np.nan, (1, 2)])
